common.RequestConsultationSupTitle: We will be happy to answer your questions

about.title: What is surrogacy?
articles: Surrogacy is a method to overcome infertility in which a woman (the surrogate mother) takes on the responsibility of carrying and giving birth to a child with whom she has no genetic connection, for a couple or individual who will become the legal parents of the child after birth.
The creation of an embryo for transfer to the surrogate mother is carried out through in vitro fertilization (IVF) using the biological parents' reproductive cells.

According to legal regulations, a surrogate mother cannot have a genetic relationship with the child. Therefore, the surrogate mother is not permitted to also serve as an egg donor within the program.
about.desc: Quality of a candidate for participation in the Surrogacy program

conditions.title: Age
conditions.desc: The candidate must be between 21 and 35 years old, as this is the safest period for pregnancy and childbirth.

conditions.title: Having your own child
conditions.desc: It is necessary to have at least one healthy child born without complications, which confirms the woman's ability to successfully go through pregnancy and childbirth

conditions.title: No cesarean section
conditions.desc: There must be no information about the child being born by caesarean section

conditions.title: Rhesus factor
conditions.desc: A positive Rh factor is required.

conditions.title: Physical and mental health
conditions.desc: The candidate must be in good physical and mental condition, without chronic diseases and medical contraindications for bearing a child.

conditions.title: Absence of deprivation of parental rights
conditions.desc: The candidate should not have any problems with the guardianship authorities and there should be no deprivation of parental rights in her biography.

conditions.title: Honesty before the law
conditions.desc: No criminal record and no status of suspect or accused in a criminal case

infoBlock.title: To biological parents
desc: Our surrogacy center offers a wide range of programs for couples and single women who dream of having a child.
We provide comprehensive solutions that consider all aspects of reproductive technologies and ensure complete confidentiality of information about the biological parents.

infoBlock.title: To biological parents
desc: Our programs cover all key stages—from organizational to medical and legal—without long waiting periods.
One of our top priorities is achieving a successful outcome. We do everything possible to ensure that the pregnancy and birth process takes place in the most comfortable conditions.

information: Management of pregnancy and childbirth in the best clinic
Organization of Nutrition and Accommodation for the Surrogate Mother
Monitoring at All Stages of the Program

data.title: Contract Signing
data.desc: At the initial consultation, Genetic parents become more familiar with the content of the Center's programs and their main stages. At the initial consultation, Genetic parents become more familiar with the content of the Center's programs and their main stages.

data.title: Contract Signing
data.desc: After selecting the appropriate program, the genetic parents sign a contract with the Center, which then begins searching for a candidate to serve as the surrogate mother and prepares her for embryo transfer according to the schedule specified in the contract.

data.title: Medical Screening
data.desc: Before joining the program, the surrogate candidate must undergo a medical examination. The Center organizes this screening at medical facilities. If the tests and examination results are favorable, which will be communicated to the genetic parents, the candidate receives final approval.

data.title: Contract with the Surrogate Mother
data.desc: The Center prepares a personalized surrogacy agreement with the surrogate mother, acting on behalf of either the Center or the genetic parents.

data.title: Preparation of the Surrogate Mother for Embryo Transfer
data.desc: Based on the screening results, the reproductive specialist prescribes medications for the surrogate candidate to prepare her endometrium for embryo transfer (hormonal therapy).

data.title: Embryo Transfer
data.desc: On the appointed day, the embryo is transferred to the surrogate mother’s uterus. At 6-8 weeks of pregnancy, an ultrasound is performed to confirm successful implantation and detect the fetal heartbeat, marking the onset of pregnancy.

data.title: Pregnancy Care for the Surrogate Mother
data.desc: During the entire pregnancy, the surrogate mother lives in a specialized apartment. A coordinator from the Center is assigned to ensure compliance with doctor’s instructions, a proper regimen, nutrition, and to assist with daily needs and leisure activities. The surrogate mother undergoes regular medical check-ups and is provided with necessary medications if needed.

data.title: Documentation for the Newborn
data.desc: After the baby’s birth, the Center arranges for the notarized consent of the surrogate mother to list the genetic parents as the legal parents on the birth certificate and confirms the surrogate’s absence of any claims.

law.title: In our country, surrogacy is safe and regulated by law
law.supTitle: Family Code of the Kyrgyz Republic

info.title: Experience and professionalism
info.desc: Our clinic has many years of experience in the field of reproductive technologies. A team of doctors, lawyers and psychologists specializing in surrogacy ensures high standards of quality and professionalism at every stage of the program.

info.title: Individual approach
info.desc: We take into account all the needs and wishes of our clients. An individual program is developed for each family, starting with the selection of a surrogate mother and ending with legal support at all stages.

info.title: Legal security
info.desc: Our specialists provide full legal protection for all parties, accompanying the process from start to finish. All agreements are formalized in accordance with the law, which guarantees the protection of the rights of both the parents and the surrogate mother.

info.title: Modern technologies
info.desc: The clinic is equipped with advanced technology and equipment for diagnosis, fertilization and monitoring of the pregnancy process. We use the latest techniques, which increases the chances of a successful pregnancy and healthy birth.

info.title: Comprehensive support
info.desc: At all stages of the program, parents and surrogate mothers receive comprehensive support. Medical assistance, psychological counseling, legal support - we create comfortable conditions for all participants in the process.

info.title: Privacy
info.desc: We strictly respect confidentiality and guarantee complete privacy to every client. Data is protected at all levels and your personal information remains completely confidential.

about.title: TANG IVF
about.desc: is a Family Planning and Infertility Center that uses American reproductive technologies to help you realize your dream of becoming parents as soon as possible.

director.supTitle: Welcome to TANG Medical Center and thank you for considering us as a partner in helping you create the family you desire.
desc: We do our best to provide you with the knowledge, advanced technology and the latest medical advances in fertility treatment to maximize your chances of pregnancy.

Our clinic is licensed in accordance with the regulations of the Ministry of Health of the Kyrgyz Republic as an assisted reproductive center. Our primary goal is to provide the best service combined with a sincere commitment and dedication to individualized and compassionate care. We pride ourselves on paying attention to detail, being accessible and deeply empathizing with each patient.
Our state-of-the-art laboratory is equipped with the latest and most reliable equipment, fully compliant with management requirements and international best practice.

Our clinic's philosophy is to provide excellent care with a personalized and compassionate approach, so that your journey to parenthood is stress-free and any physical discomfort and disruption in your life is minimized.

Our medical team of experienced fertility specialists, embryologists, nurses and allied health professionals work cohesively to ensure you have a positive experience. Together, we will overcome all challenges, and our dedicated team will help fulfill your most sincere desires to start a family.
Contact or come see us for a personal consultation. We are always happy to provide you with the information you need. We hope to meet you soon!
director.name: Hu Deyu
director.position: Hu Deyu, CEO of TANG Medical Center

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.supTitle: You can contact us in a number of ways

hero.title: Egg donation - give a chance for happiness

about.title: What is egg donation?
about.desc: Egg donation is a noble opportunity to help those who dream of having children but cannot have them for medical reasons. By joining the program, you can give the joy of motherhood to others while receiving a full medical examination and compensation.
about.underTitle: You must meet a few basic criteria to qualify for the program:
list: Absence of hereditary diseases and bad habits.
Having a healthy child of your own is an advantage.

stagesList.title: Initial consultation and application
stagesList.desc: Our experts will explain the program, answer your questions, and conduct an initial assessment.

stagesList.title: Selecting a questionnaire
stagesList.desc: If your profile is of interest to the family, a manager will contact you and invite you to the clinic to join the program.

stagesList.title: Medical examination
stagesList.desc: A set of tests and exams to assess your health and readiness for donation.

stagesList.title: Legal formalization
stagesList.desc: Signing a contract that protects your rights and privacy.

stagesList.title: Oocyte retrieval procedure
stagesList.desc: The procedure is carried out under anesthesia, takes a few minutes, and the next day you can return to your usual life.

stagesList.title: Embryo transfer
stagesList.desc: A course of drugs to increase the number of eggs and prepare the recipient's endometrium for the implantation of a fertilized egg.

hero.title: How to become a surrogate mother
hero.desc: Becoming a surrogate mother is an opportunity not only to help a family find happiness, but also to receive meaningful support and compensation. We accompany surrogate mothers at every stage, guaranteeing complete safety and care.

about.title: We Care for You Every Step of the Way
desc: Each surrogate mother is unique to us, and we are genuinely grateful for her willingness to help. We surround you with care and attention to make this journey as smooth and positive as possible.

You are part of a team creating a miracle. Together, we help fulfill the dream of parenthood for those who have been waiting a long time. Your contribution is invaluable, and we’ll do everything to ensure you feel important and supported.

stages.title: Program Stages
stages.desc: Our program includes several key stages, ensuring your safety and support at every step.
stages.supTitle: Examinations for entry into the program
stages.desc1: In order to participate in a surrogacy program, it is important to make sure you are healthy and ready to carry a child. All exams are organized and paid for by the clinic and are done at a time that is convenient for you. Key steps include:

stagesProgram.title: Consultation and Application
stagesProgram.desc: Initial meeting with a coordinator to discuss all program details

stagesProgram.title: Medical Examination
stagesProgram.desc: A comprehensive health check to confirm eligibility for the program

stagesProgram.title: Legal Arrangements
stagesProgram.desc: Signing an agreement that protects your rights and interests throughout the process

stagesProgram.title: Family Selection
stagesProgram.desc: A joint selection of biological parents for a comfortable partnership

stagesProgram.title: IVF and Embryo Transfer
stagesProgram.desc: Continuous medical supervision and support throughout the pregnancy

stagesProgram.title: Pregnancy Care
stagesProgram.desc: Ongoing medical assistance and financial support during each stage of pregnancy

stagesProgram.title: Delivery and Program Completion
stagesProgram.desc: After the child is born, they are entrusted to the biological parents, concluding the program

stagesProgram.title: Payment Completion
stagesProgram.desc: Full and guaranteed completion of all compensation

stagesList.title: General medical examination
stagesList.desc: The doctor will assess your health, perform a physical exam, and take a medical history

stagesList.title: Blood and urine tests
stagesList.desc: Standard tests to detect possible infections and assess the general condition of the body

stagesList.title: Gynecological examination
stagesList.desc: swab from the external pharynx of the cervix, vaginal vault, urethra

stagesList.title: Hormone tests
stagesList.desc: Hormone tests can help confirm your ability to carry a pregnancy to term.

stagesList.title: Psychological counseling
stagesList.desc: A conversation with a psychologist to confirm your psychological readiness for the program.

stagesList.title: Examinations as indicated
stagesList.desc: Additional tests may be ordered if necessary to rule out any risks.

contactUs.title: Contact us
contactUs.desc: If you still have questions or want to learn more about the surrogacy program, our team is here to help. We will answer any questions, explain all the steps, conditions and provide full information about the process.

accreditation.title: The partner clinic is accredited by the American College of Embryology (ACE).
accreditation.desc: In addition to all the above-mentioned irrefutable advantages, the partner clinic is accredited by the American College of Embryology (ACE), which indicates that the partner clinic relies in its activities on the scientific base of world-class professors. The partner clinic participates in international conferences and carries out its medical activities according to the advanced standards of the college
